title: PROJECT Materials Question?
body:
Will the materials from this event like the PROJECT Core, Cache Fragments and Blueprints go away once the event concludes? 

I just want to know since I don't really like to have left-over clutter in my Loot and Crafting inventory.

replies.body:
Nope! They'll stick around and you'll be able to disenchant them for a bit of essence if you'd like to do some Hextech Spring Cleaning! :P

For full details on the PROJECT: DISRUPTION event, [check out our FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/210155266-PROJECT-DISRUPTION-FAQ). Let me know if you have any questions!
Oh sorry, I didn't see that in the FAQ. Thanks for the help!
